dialogues.speaker: Player
dialogues.text: What brings you to this town?

dialogues.speaker: NPC
dialogues.text: I've heard rumors of a strange occurrence in the nearby forest.

dialogues.speaker: Player
dialogues.text: Strange occurrence? What do you mean?

dialogues.speaker: NPC
dialogues.text: People have gone in to cut wood, but never returned. Some say they saw shadowy figures lurking in the trees.
